title: StarTree | Senior Software Engineer | Offer
content:
Education: B.Tech (Tier 1 College)
Years of Experience: 6.8 Years
Prior Experience: Reputed Product Base company (Ecommerce)
Current CTC: 46 LPA (Fixed)
Date of the Offer: July 2024
Company: StarTree
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer 
Location: Remote
Salary: 66 LPA (Base)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 5 Lakhs (Signing Bonous with 1.5 Yr Crawl Back)
Stock bonus: 4500000 (Vested in 4 Years)
Yearly Bonus: 10% of Base
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 66 + 6.6 + 5 + 11.25 (Stock Per Year) = ~90 LPA
Benefits: Other Standard Benifits Like health insurance, etc
